alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:54PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Thomas, northeastern Logan, southwestern Sheridan and northwestern Gove Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 854 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Oakley, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oakley around 905 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 61 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
